CustomField.description: This field is optional, but required when using payment structure. It is manually populated. It sets the first payment date of a loan repayment schedule. When used with payment structure, this field is used to determine amortization and complex payments.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First Payment date is the expected date the first loan payment will be made. This field is used to determine amortization and complex payments.
CustomField.label: First Payment Date
